short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pause YouTube / Bandcamp with the space bar, even when the player isn't in focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No more annoying surprise downward scrolling when you really just wanted to unpause! No more accidentally muting / unmuting when you really just wanted to pause!
